roleset.name: to recite as a chant, intone
roleset.note: CHANT-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls manner_speaking-37.3, performance-26.7-1. (from chant.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: In the stands , people waved ANC flags , wore ANC T-shirts , sang ANC songs and chanted ANC slogans .

example.name: another transitive
example.text: The protesters who greeted Mikhail Gorbachev at East Berlin 's airport earlier this month were n't shouting `` Go U.S.A '' -- they were chanting `` Gorby , Help Us . ''
